trans-unit.source: The top-level object for the bootstrapper system.
trans-unit.target: 啟動載入器系統的最上層物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BootstrapperBuilder" name="BootstrapperBuilder" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_BootstrapperBuilder" name="BootstrapperBuilder" href=""></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BootstrapperBuilder" name="BootstrapperBuilder" href=""></xref> class, using the specified version of [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_BootstrapperBuilder" name="BootstrapperBuilder" href=""></xref>類別中，使用指定的版本[!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Generates a bootstrapper by using the specified settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的設定，以產生啟動載入器。

trans-unit.source: The properties used to create the bootstrapper.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立啟動載入器的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The results of the bootstrapper generation.
trans-unit.target: 啟動載入器產生的結果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the directories to which bootstrapper component files are copied when they are created, given the specified settings.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的設定的啟動載入器元件檔案複製到在建立時的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.IProduct.ProductCode*> values of the selected components.
The culture used to create the bootstrapper.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立啟動載入器所使用的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The fallback culture used to create the bootstrapper.
trans-unit.target: 用於建立啟動載入器的後援文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the bootstrapper packages the selected components.
trans-unit.target: 指定啟動載入器封裝所選的元件的方式。

trans-unit.source: The directories to which bootstrapper component files are copied when they are created, given the specified settings.
trans-unit.target: 目錄的啟動載入器元件檔案複製到它們建立時，指定的設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the required bootstrapper files.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檔案的必要的啟動載入器的位置。

trans-unit.source: The path for the required bootstrapper files.
trans-unit.target: 必要的啟動載入器檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets all products available at the current bootstrapper <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder.Path*>.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的啟動載入器<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder.Path*>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder.Path*>取得所有可用產品

trans-unit.source: All products available at the current bootstrapper <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder.Path*>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的啟動載入器<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder.Path*>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder.Path*>可用的所有產品
